entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
